AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE NATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATIONS
COMMISSION TO ISSUE PROVISIONAL AUTHORITY TO OWNERS AND
OPERATORS OF PUBLIC TELECOMMUNICATIONS ENTITIES FOR
THEIR CONTINUED OPERATIONS PENDING RENEWAL OF THEIR
CONGRESSIONAL FRANCHISE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NUMBER 7925, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE PUBLIC
TELECOMMUNICATIONS POLICY ACT OF THE PHILIPPINES, AND FOR
OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES since 2020-05-20
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06757
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE NATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION TO ISSUE PROVISIONAL AUTHORITY TO OWNERS AND OPERATORS OF PUBLIC TELECOMMUNICATIONS ENTITIES FOR THEIR CONTINUED OPERATIONS PENDING RENEWAL OF THEIR CONGRESSIONAL FRANCHISE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NUMBER 7925, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE PUBLIC TELECOMMUNICATIONS POLICY ACT OF THE PHILIPPINES, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

DATE FILED : 2020-05-19
